name: Glittering Gemstones
description:
The target character gains 1 additional Max HP.
(A character can consume at most 1 Food per Round)
descriptionraw: The target character gains 1 additional Max HP.\n(A character can consume at most 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#3101}Food per Round)
descriptionreplaced: The target character gains 1 additional Max HP.\n(A character can consume at most 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#3101}Food per Round)
storytext: Multicolored biscuits. The sour and sweet jam gives off the clear luster of crystalline form, adding a shine to the crunchy treats. Such radiance! Such tastiness! What could this be but equal even to the most precious jewels?
